name: Mad Pack
description:
Mad Pack is an MMO game that continues the tradition of old role-playing games but brings the mechanics to a new, modern level. Try on the role of one of the three classes (Warrior, Archer, and Mage) to stop the invasion of monsters on the Shard.

Key Features:
  • The class system. Each class has its own unique abilities and battle tactics, and their combination will help you cope with even the most difficult opponents.
  • Rogue-like elements. Check how far you can go in the battles on the Shard.
  • Loot generation system. It will be very difficult to find two identical things. Choose the equipment that suits your style of play.

Coming soon:
  • Full multi-level campaign
  • Hell Mode: Go from defense to offensive and reach the source of the invasion. Hell is much hotter than the surface!
